data.name: pl_textbox_width.Help
data.value: Enter the desired width of the message entry textbox.

data.name: pl_textbox_height.Help
data.value: Enter the desired height of the message entry textbox.

data.name: pl_show_RTE.Help
data.value: Select 'Yes' if you wish to use a Rich Text Editor for the body of the feedback. Select 'No' to use a standard text field.

data.name: pl_show_sender.Help
data.value: Select 'Yes' if you wish to show the sender's name and email address. This will allow to the sender change these attributes. If you wish to allow feedback from non-registered users you MUST enable this option.

data.name: pl_show_subject.Help
data.value: Select the type of subject you would like the sender to be able to use? You can manage pre-defined subjects and recipients from the "Manage Subjects" menu.

data.name: pl_show_send_copy.Help
data.value: Select 'Yes' if you wish to allow the user to send a copy of the message to themselves.

data.name: pl_enable_captcha.Help
data.value: Select 'Yes' if you wish to enable CAPTCHA support. This will require users to enter a unique code before the message can be sent. This helps prevent SPAM. Selecting 'Yes (Anonymous Users Only)' will enable CAPTCHA for users who have not yet registered for your site.

data.name: pl_default_sender.Help
data.value: Select 'Host Email' or 'Portal Email' if you encounter issues with your anti-spam software marking messages from this form as 'spoofed'. The Reply-To address will still be the user's address. Select 'User Email' if you know that messages will not be marked as SPAM by your mail server.

data.name: pl_default_recipient.Help
data.value: Enter the email address that feedback should be sent to by default. Note: This module's pre-defined subjects capability will allow you to specify different recipients based on a specific subject.

data.name: pl_show_end_user_help.Help
data.value: Select 'Yes' if you wish to display a small icon next to each field. When the end-user clicks on this icon, help text will be displayed for the field.

data.name: pl_show_account_number.Help
data.value: Select 'Yes' if you wish to enable the Account Number field.

data.name: pl_require_account_number.Help
data.value: Select 'Yes' if the user MUST enter data into the Account Number field.

data.name: pl_show_address.Help
data.value: 'Yes (United States)' if the user should only be able to enter a United States address. Select 'Yes (United States & Canada)' if the user should only be able to enter a United States or Canada address. Select 'Yes' if the user should be able to enter any address.

data.name: pl_require_address.Help
data.value: Select 'Yes' if the user MUST enter data into the Mailing Address field.

data.name: pl_show_phone.Help
data.value: Select 'Yes' if you wish to enable the Phone field.

data.name: pl_require_phone.Help
data.value: Select 'Yes' if the user MUST enter data into the Phone field.

data.name: pl_show_fax.Help
data.value: Select 'Yes' if you wish to enable the Fax field.

data.name: pl_require_fax.Help
data.value: Select 'Yes' if the user MUST enter data into the Fax field.

data.name: pl_show_url.Help
data.value: Select 'Yes' if you wish to enable the Web Site URL field.

data.name: pl_require_url.Help
data.value: Select 'Yes' if the user MUST enter data into the Web Site URL field.
